title: For Trade: My T206 Cards for your 1975 Topps
author: Jayworld

posts.post_title: For Trade: My T206 Cards for your 1975 Topps
posts.post_content:
I am working to complete the 1975 Topps baseball set, and I'd like to trade five of my T206 cards (see scan) for comparable value of cards I need in the 1975 Topps baseball set. I am collecting cards for the set VG to EX and raw (no graded cards, please). My preference would be to trade all five T206 cards to someone that can offer the most value, but am open to all options. The T206 cards are Clancy (SC 350), Jordan (SC 350), Criss (Piedmont 150), Powell (Piedmonts 150), and Williams (Piedmont 350).

The major 1975 Topps cards I need are:
#4 Al Kaline
#5 Nolan Ryan
#7 Bosman/Busby/Ryan
#50 Brooks Robinson
#60 Ferguson Jenkins
#70 Mike Schmidt
#80 Carlton Fisk
#130 Phil Niekro
#150 Bob Gibson
#180 Joe Morgan
#195 MVP
#199 MVP
#200 MVP
#223 Robin Yount
#228 George Brett
#230 Jim Catfish Hunter
#260 Johnny Bench
#280 Carl Yastrzemski
#300 Reggie Jackson
#311 Leaders
#312 Leaders
#320 Pete Rose
#331 Frank Robinson
#335 Jim Palmer
#370 Tom Seaver
#386 Checklist (unmarked)
#500 Nolan Ryan
#517 Checklist (unmarked)
#531 Cincinnati Reds team card
#540 Lou Brock
#561 Oakland A's team card
#580 Cleveland Indians team card
#600 Rod Carew
#615 Rookies
#618 Rookies
#620 Gary Carter
#622 Fred Lynn
#623 Keith Hernandez
#625 Boog Powell
#630 Greg Luzinski
#640 Harmon Killebrew

Thanks for looking. Please PM to contact.

I have been asked for the trade value, and I would value all five cards in the $15 range, give or take, so $70 - $75 value for the lot of five T206 cards, if that helps?

All PMs have been replied to so far. Thanks.

Jay

Trade has been finalized. Thanks for all that contacted me with offers.

Thanks!
